name: Grounding Rod with 39ft Wire, Portable Grounding Rod for Earthing, Grounded Earth Connected Products, Easy to Use with Grounding Mat, Grounding Sheet, Pillowcase, Blankets
short_description: 【HIGH PERFORMANCE】Our grounding rod is 12 inches long and made from copper + PU wire (built-in 7-core copper foil wire) for superior strength and durability. The included grounding cord measures at just over 39 feet long.

【WIDE USE】The 39 ft cord can easily connect you to the Earth, even from the second floor of your home.Ground rod with 39ft ground wire can be used to ground grounding products, mats, sheets, pads, wristbands, blankets, pillows.

【GROUNDED CONNECT】This grounding rod ensures maximum durability for your electrical system, ensuring unmatched safety for your electrical system. Using a grounding rod allows you to bypass your indoor grounded outlets and instead go right into the Earth. It is also perfect for people that live in older homes where the outlets are not grounded.

【YOU WILL GET】Our grounding rod includes 1pc 30cm/11.81inch copper grounding rod with a 12m/39.37ft grounding cord, 1pc 4.5m/14.76ft white ground wire, 1pc blue anti-static wristband, which will allow you to connect your grounding/earthing product directly to the rod.

【EASY USE】Pound the grounding rod all the way into the earth.Simply insert the copper rod into the ground, ideally below a window or adjacent to a door, then attach the wire to the grounding mat for effective usage.Then connect one end of the cord to the top of the grounding rod and the other end of the cord to your grounding/earthing product.

name: Portable Ground Rod with Electric Jumper Leads Cable - Grounding Rod and Copper Wire Electric Fence Leads with Alligator Clips for Electric Fence Charger
short_description: Complete Set: Includes an electric fence grounding rod, a warning signs, two 3-foot fence leads, and two alligator clips for connecting power and grounding systems. Compatible with most electric fence energizers for reliable use.
Durable Construction: The high-quality alligator clips and sturdy wiring are designed to hold up in extreme weather conditions, ensuring long-lasting performance on your farm.
Quick Installation: Setup in just two steps: unscrew the energizer knobs, connect the corresponding leads, and secure the cover. You’ll be ready to go in minutes with a safe, secure connection.
Portable Ground Rod: The oval-shaped grounding rod is easy to drive into the ground, remove, and even secure anchor ropes. Ideal for use with electric fence chargers and generators.

Versatile Protection: Perfect for securing farm fence lines, protecting livestock and crops, and keeping out pests like squirrels, deer, and raccoons. Great for use in gardens, yards, and other outdoor spaces
product_description: Ensure safety and compliance with these essential ground rod, wire, and crocodile clip warning signs. Crafted with durable materials, these highly visible signs serve as crucial reminders for electrical hazards. Whether working on construction sites, industrial facilities, or residential projects, these warning signs help prevent accidents and injuries by clearly marking potential dangers. The ground rod sign alerts workers and bystanders to the presence of grounded electrical systems, while the wire and crocodile clip signs indicate live wires and connections. With their bold colors and clear messaging, these signs are easy to spot from a distance, making them an indispensable addition to any workplace committed to promoting a safe environment. Ensure compliance with safety regulations and protect your team by incorporating these essential warning signs into your operations.

name: Grounding rod for earthing,Grounding Wire with Crocodile Clip for electric fences,generator,antennas (17.4 inch Ground Rod + 6.2ft Crocodile Clip Wire)
short_description: This 1/2” diameter, 17.4” long ground rod is designed for durability and precision,ensuring easy compatibility with wires up to 12AWG solid or stranded.
Featuring an oval-eye design, this rod is easy to drive into the ground, remove, or anchor ropes securely, providing unmatched convenience for various applications.
Made of solid steel with a copper-clad finish, this grounding rod offers excellent corrosion resistance, enhanced durability, and high tensile strength for even the most demanding environments.

The included 6.2ft UL-certified flexible copper wire features a durable PVC insulation for added safety, while its tin-plated copper core resists oxidation and reduces resistance. This makes the set ideal for electric fence grounding, satellite dishes, off-air antennas, and generator bonding.
Equipped with crocodile clips and tinned copper lugs, this set ensures static protection and allows for flexible use—combine or separate as needed for diverse grounding tasks.
